title: The Writer's Almanac for Monday, December 6, 2021
description: It’s children's writer Susanna Moodie’s birthday today. Born 1903 in England, she wrote about frontier life in Canada, compared to the Little House books, but with the goal of discouraging English people from undertaking the adventure.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
